objects.text: • HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE • ERGONOMIC DESIGN • PREMIUM COMFORT

product_details.description: Product Description          Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Cream             From the Manufacturer          Amazon Basics VERSATILE USE: Office desk chair for home office, work station, or conference room ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: Adjustable seat height, adjustable seat angle, and tilt control for customizable comfort STURDY CONSTRUCTION:Supports up to 275 pounds; sturdy KD metal base COMFORTABLE DESIGN:Puresoft PU upholstery in Black; contoured padded seat, backrest, and armrests for comfort; durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly instructions included; components (casters, base, arms, seat mechanism, hardware kit) arrive packed in the back cushion PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Product Dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25 - 42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25 - 30 inches Brand - Amazon Basics ** Color - Cream ** Product Dimensions - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Size - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Back Style - Mid Back **

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a premium office chair at the center, highlighted by a circular white background surrounded by a double dashed line, creating a focal frame around the product image (`product_image`). At the top, a bold primary heading (`heading`) in white conveys sophistication, while a secondary subheading (`subheading`) in bright yellow emphasizes comfort. A price tag (`price`) is embedded inside a striking orange-yellow radial gradient circle. Informational text (`description`) spans the bottom in white, featuring product highlights. A yellow call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with blue text (`cta`) entices users to engage. The background is a smooth blue radial gradient with abstract lines and outlined circles for visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: `#B0C4DE`
- Steel Blue: `#4682B4`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Gold: `#FFD700`
- Orange: `#FFA500`
product_color: The product image showcases an elegant office chair in a soft ivory-white color (#F5F5EF) with sleek black accents (#1A1A1A) on the armrest frames and base. The design presents a professional, minimalist aesthetic perfect for modern office setups. The chair’s creamy upholstery contrasts sharply with the matte black components, creating a balanced visual hierarchy. The stitching and shadows add depth, subtly blending the light tones without overpowering the darker elements. For an advertisement banner, a refined palette of Ivory White (#F5F5EF), Charcoal Black (#1A1A1A), Light Gray (#D3D3D3), and Soft Beige (#EAE7DD) can evoke sophistication and comfort.
